description: This PHP script manages user session validation, includes a CSRF protection library, scans a specific directory for files, and handles file download with appropriate headers, file size checks, and data streaming.

methods.name: scandir
methods.description: Reads the contents of the specified directory, returning an array of filenames.

methods.name: filesize
methods.description: Returns the size of the specified file.

methods.name: header
methods.description: Sends a raw HTTP header to the client.

methods.name: fopen
methods.description: Opens a file or URL stream.

methods.name: feof
methods.description: Checks if the file pointer is at the end of the file.

methods.name: fread
methods.description: Reads a specified number of bytes from a file.
